blackCards.text: Why did the chicken cross the road?
What's the most unexpected thing you can find in a treasure chest?
What's the best way to impress a cat?
Why did the programmer go broke?
What's the secret ingredient in grandma's cookies?
What's the real reason behind crop circles?
Why did the alien choose Earth for vacation?
What's the ultimate superpower for procrastinators?
What's the best way to get rid of a ghost?
What's the best way to get rid of a vampire?
What's the best way to get rid of a werewolf?
What's the best way to get rid of a zombie?
For my next trick, I will pull _____ and _____ out of a hat

whiteCards: Because it wanted to get to the other side.
A good book and a cup of coffee.
The ability to turn invisible when no one is watching.
A rubber chicken with a pulley in the middle.
A laser pointer and a cardboard box.
He spent all his time debugging.
A dash of love and a sprinkle of magic.
The power to instantly finish any task by saying 'I'll do it later.'
A cat that can play the piano.
